metadata.name: SoRoyal #1
metadata.description:
A GLIMPSE into India's ancient history. SoRoyal is a collection of unique NFTs that were hand-painted by contemporary artists who specialize in Rajput and Mughal paintings.

If the price eventually reaches and is bought at 4 ETH and above. The owner who bought it at that specified price point now has the option to submit a request to us (* the request MUST be initiated by the buyer first, we will provide you with more details once you have contacted us*), and have the physical painting be shipped to them so that it is in their custody. 

After which they have the full rights to that original painting and what they choose to do with it. Once physical ownership has been transferred by SoRoyal, we are no longer responsible for any secondary sales/rules in regards to the further transfer of ownership of the physical paintings.
